goal.ch: 本課程將介紹生活及工業領域中常見之冷凍空調系統並教導學生其運作原理。除此之外也將結合熱傳學與熱力學來進一步分析冷凍循環系統。課程後半也將介紹冷凍空調系統中常見的冷媒以及其發展史。期望學生在修習本課程後能深刻瞭解到如何使用其在基礎課程所學的知識來分析生活上實質的問題。
goal.en: The refrigeration system used in the domestic and industrial region will be introduced in this course. The refrigeration cycle will be analyzed further with the knowledge of heat transfer and thermodynamics. The commonly used refrigerants will also be introduced in this course.

outline.ch:
以講授方式進行授課，一次考試，需要繳交一次書面報告，並在期末讓學生進行報告。
1: Course introduction
2: Refrigeration and refrigerants
3/4: Evaporator
5/6: Condenser
7/8: Compressor and Midterm
9: Compressor
10: Expansion devices
11/12: Refrigerants and it’s development
13/14: Domestic refrigerator and freezer
15: Room air conditioners
16~18: Presentation
outline.en:
Schedule each week
1: Course introduction
2: Refrigeration and refrigerants
3/4: Evaporator
5/6: Condenser
7/8: Compressor and Midterm
9: Compressor
10: Expansion devices
11/12: Refrigerants and it’s development
13/14: Domestic refrigerator and freezer
15: Room air conditioners
16~18: Presentation

textbook.ch:
教科書: Cengage Learning, Bill Whitman, Bill Johnson, John Tomczyk, Eugene Silberstein,  Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Technology 7th edition
參考書目: 
1. Incropera, Bergman and Lavine‘s Fundamentals of heat and mass transfer, 8th edition
2. McGraw-Hill Education, Cengel, Y. A. and Boles, M. A., Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach, 9th edition
textbook.en:
教科書: Cengage Learning, Bill Whitman, Bill Johnson, John Tomczyk, Eugene Silberstein,  Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Technology 7th edition
參考書目: 
1. Incropera, Bergman and Lavine‘s Fundamentals of heat and mass transfer, 8th edition
2. McGraw-Hill Education, Cengel, Y. A. and Boles, M. A., Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach, 9th edition

gradMethod.ch: 評量方式由一次考試(30％)，一次書面報告(10％)，口頭報告(30％)以及課堂活動(30％)決定
gradMethod.en: Exam (30％), Reseach report (10％), Presentation (30％), class activity (30％)

flexDiscription.en: Depends on in teaching progress in class

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

ch: 系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
en: Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
